author: Stephen Wilmot
title: Durex-Maker Reckitt Avoids $20 Billion Headache
text:
Having turned down Advil, Reckitt Benckiser needs to find another treatment for the headache of weak growth.
The U.K.-based consumer group, which makes Clearasil acne cream, Durex condoms and Lysol sanitizers, announced late Wednesday that it had ended its pursuit of Pfizer’s consumer-health unit. The U.S. health care giant put its nonprescription business, which is expected to fetch up to $20 billion, on the block last October.
